description: Students learn basic performance practice on core instruments in each instrument family. Additional topics include: common performance issues and their possible solution; Best Practices in teaching and learning core instruments of the family; and technology for teaching, learning, or composing for instruments as appropriate. Offered annually in the spring semester. Prerequisite:declared music education or composition major or permission of the instructor.
name: Percussion Techniques
notes: For Music Composition and Music Education Majors only.
Open to a limited-number of first-year students.
prerequisites: Prerequisite:declared music education or composition major or permission of the instructor.
